summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3693 for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northeast, from the south line of the Green Lake Low Service Reservoir site to East 85th Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45480, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
